title: Prime commercial building for sale in the heart of Ratnapura town
details:
Prime commercial building for sale in the heart of Ratnapura town

• Facing main road (Frank Hettiarachchi Mawatha)
• Land Extent -28.5 Perches
• Building area - 8600Sqft
• No.of floors - 4
• Each floor has separate Entrance/Toilets
• Ample parking space

Previously has been used as a full functioning banquet hall, restaurant and a bakery which generated a monthly rental income of Rs.350,000/=

Ideal for a similar type of business or any other commercial purpose such as Banquet hall, tuition classes, office space or storage space

Current monthly rental income from Roof top mobile tower Rs. 40000/=

Price: 90 Million

Please contact 076 161 2223 for further details
